channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Silver Is Having a Golden Moment
item.description: Silver’s unique properties—as both a precious metal and an industrial commodity—make it an attractive asset to hold today.

item.title: Oil Price Expected to Weaken If OPEC+ Hikes Supply
item.description: Expectations that the OPEC and its allies will start unwinding voluntary output curbs of 2.2 million barrels a day starting from December is adding to...

item.title: Nvidia’s stock chart shows how bulls are using the recent pause to get refreshed
item.description: Nvidia’s stock is building a “pennant” chart pattern, which may suggest the preceding upturn is set to resume.

item.title: Why Drug Distributors Are Buying Cancer Specialists
item.description: The big three drug distributors are going all in on oncology practices.

item.title: Most workers still struggle to invest in their retirement. This could help.
item.description: Nearly 80% of workers say they don’t know much about their finances.

item.title: End of student-loan ‘on-ramp’ means missed payments can hurt borrowers. Here’s how to protect your credit score.
item.description: One year after the pause on student-loan payments ended, Uncle Sam is getting ready to tell credit-reporting companies which borrowers are falling beh...

item.title: A High-Profile Clean-Energy Startup Is Running Short on Cash
item.description: Monolith is struggling to meet production targets needed for $1 billion government loan.

item.title: The Fed Made Its Move. Why Didn't I?
item.description: In which our columnist investigates a financial pitfall called the ‘flypaper effect,’ only to find that he was trapped in it himself.

item.title: Employer-match money could go toward more than your 401(k) after this IRS ruling
item.description: Ruling could set stage for workers to choose among four areas where they want their company match to go

item.title: ‘I don’t want to spend my remaining days living hand to mouth’: I divorced my husband and remarried. Can I claim his Social Security?
item.description: “I hope that it doesn’t trigger my ex-husband. He has a short fuse.”
